pkgmetadata.longdescription: Biogeography-Based Optimization // This package provides an R implementation of Biogeography-Based Optimization (BBO), originally invented by Prof. Dan Simon, Cleveland State University, Ohio. This method is an application of the concept of biogeography, a study of the geographical distribution of biological organisms, to optimization problems. More information about this method can be found here: http://academic.csuohio.edu/simond/bbo/.
